contentrichtext.text: {{Refimprove|date=December 2009}} '''Dudley''' is the name of a [[ghost town]] in [[Wapello County, Iowa|Wapello County]], [[Iowa]], [[United States]]. One Dudley in [[Wapello County, Iowa|Wapello County]], one in [[Polk County, Iowa|Polk County]]. Both 1908 and 1920 surveys of northwestern Wapello County have a [[United States Postal Service|post office]] located here. A sign on the former edge of town reads: "Population 12 and God only knows how many dogs and cats." ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Wapello County, Iowa}} [[Category:Ghost towns in Iowa]] [[Category:Geography of Wapello County, Iowa]] {{Iowa-geo-stub}} {{US-ghost-town-stub}}
